plot: This film examines the AIDS epidemic through the eyes of a young man in the slums of Nairobi. It deals with the struggle to find a way out of a conflict instigated by ignorance, hate and assumptions.
title: Sumu
plot_es: This film examines the AIDS epidemic through the eyes of a young man in the slums of Nairobi. It deals with the struggle to find a way out of a conflict instigated by ignorance, hate and assumptions.
